data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Isparta to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Isparta, Turkey

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Isparta, Turkey a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2661 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Isparta, Turkey.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, help the 157 believers in Isparta to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Hemshin people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Hemshin people.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Isparta to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Isparta against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.section_summary:
the state of Isparta, Turkey has a population of 417,800.

We estimate Isparta has 157 people who might know Jesus, 2,339 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 415,304 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,661 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Isparta, Turkey to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
